nodes.text: The Pindra system was an Inner Rim star system located near the Colla and Chazwa systems, along the Perlemian Trade Route. Pindra was the site of trap laid by New Republic Admiral Willham Burke in 5 ABY that led to the destruction of Imperial Admiral Ledre Okins, further opening the way for the New Republic to eventually retake the galactic capital, Coruscant.
